query:
SELECT 
  s.name as service_name,
  c.name as country_name,
  a.name as api_name,
  a.currency,
  a.exchange_rate,
  a.profit_percentage,
  p.smshubPrice as custo_original_centavos,
  p.ourPrice as preco_final_centavos,
  p.lastSync
FROM prices p
JOIN services s ON p.serviceId = s.id
JOIN countries c ON p.countryId = c.id
JOIN sms_apis a ON p.apiId = a.id
WHERE s.name LIKE '%Outros%' AND a.id = 2
LIMIT 1
